name: Petrifying Pumpkins (Beta v0.0.1)
description:
A Horror game where you are a child scared of haunted pumpkins. You must click on the pumpkins with faces to stop them, if you are not fast enough they will kill you. Use your flashlight to see the area around you. As you progress you will earn candies which can be used to upgrade your items.

This game is in Beta, if you find any bugs post them here

if you have any suggestions or ideas post them here
